alert.note: Alert for Crittenden; Mississippi (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 11 at 1:46PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Mississippi, northeastern Crittenden, northwestern Crockett, Tipton, southeastern Dyer, southwestern Gibson, Lauderdale, northwestern Haywood and north central Shelby Counties through 215 PM CDT... At 146 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Unionville to near Gilmore. Movement was east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Millington, Covington, Ripley, Wilson, Fort Pillow State Park, Munford, Brighton, Halls, Joiner, Gilmore, Nutbush, Forked Deer, Fulton, Chestnut Bluff, Dixonville, Ft Pillow, Tipton, Atoka, Henning and Maury City. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
